email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 85,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam on CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Carlos Mendez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel OCEAN TRADER, with a DWT of 92,000 and LOA of 229m. The laycan is 25-30 September, and the initial freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Kim

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 18.50 seems a bit high given the current market. Could you consider lowering the rate to USD 17.50 per MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
Carlos Mendez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

Considering our long-standing relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 18.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, and the loading window is 48 hours. Let me know if this revised offer meets your requirements.

Best regards,
Laura Kim

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

USD 18.00 per MT sounds reasonable. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
Carlos Mendez

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Contract for OCEAN TRADER
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the contract for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Laura Kim
